DOC.detailed_description: This multi-center , active-controlled , double-blind , double-dummy , parallel-group comparative study . After screen period follow placebo run-in period single-blind condition , subject randomize either ASP1941 acarbose group . Subjects take study drug double-blind condition treatment period . After completion study drug administration , follow-up period provide .
